xdi2.messaging.container

Interface ContextHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AddressHandler, StatementHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractContextHandler, GraphContextHandler

    public interface ContextHandler
extends AddressHandler, StatementHandler
    A ContextHandler can execute an XDI operation against both addresses and statements.
    Author:
    markus
